clean_data: Scrum Master Scrum Master Scrum Master Salazar Inc Oklahoma City OK Enthusiastic IT Professional with Overall 7 years of IT Industry Experience and 3 Years experience as Scrum Master leading multiple teams on SDLC in both Waterfall and Agile Environments Proven exceptional Understanding of the Scrum theory and Best Practices Experience as a Scrum Master facilitating mentoring and training teams and organization on agile implementation and best practices leading continuous improvement efforts within teams with high focus on Self Organization and Accountability and Ownership Experience facilitating preparing and leading Scrum ceremonies including Sprint planning Daily Scrums sprint review demos and collaborative design sessions experience prioritizing tasks and mitigating Impediments Familiarity with Agile Project Management Tools like JIRAConfluence TFS Experience working with Product Owners and teams to meet established Sprint and Release goals Good Understanding Software Development Life Cycle SDLC and Best Practices Work Experience Scrum Master Salazar Inc Oklahoma City OK January 2019 to Present I Play a critical role in driving culture of ownership selfdevelopment and coaching 2 scrum teams make the most out of selforganizing while ensuring adherence to Scrum Values and Best Practices by all Team members Coordinating all Scrum Ceremonies including Sprint Planning Daily Scrum meetings Sprint Retrospectives Product Backlog Refinement Sessions and Release Planning Collaborating with Product Owner and Development team on properly estimating user stories using poker planning and other technics when the need arises Removing any form of impediments for the Scrum team using both internal and external resources making sure the team can focus on the work required to meet Sprint Goal Using key Scrum metrics Burn down charts velocity Agile Board to help manage delivery of valued committed work Supporting the Product Owner to define scope and objectives and continues Product Backlog Refinement Researching AgileScrum techniques and shared findings with the team and making sure the Scrum processes and Best Practices are being followed and all timeboxed events happen and do not exceed the time frame as defined by the scrum guide Scrum Master Geico Insurance Dallas TX June 2017 to January 2019 Established and organized highperforming development teams with onshore and offshore resources Conducted grooming meetings Daily standup Sprint Planning Sprint Review Sprint Retrospective meetings Used Burndown and velocity charts to monitor project progress and radiate information to stakeholders and program managers Identified risks and impediments such as blockers issues critical defects resolvemitigated them daily Shielded my teams from external interference and distractions for optimal productivity and success in meeting sprint goals and deliverables Worked with other scrum masters to Coordinate and synchronize project plans activities and dependencies of parallel projects making sure work was continuously in sync Used consensus building approach to create strong team commitment to the project and each other Helped setup and managed Kanban board configuration for one of the teams enforcing WIP limits and making sure team members understood workflow Oracle Database Administrator Berean views adding indices dropping unnecessary indices using hints wherever possible amongst others Successful in applying RDBMS patches security patches for improving the security and functionality of the databases Extensively used AWR ADDM and explain plan for periodic performance tuning Implementing Data pump conventional exportimport utility of Oracle 11g 10g for re organizing DatabasesSchemasTables
